segments.text: Hey , Daddy , today I had really a fantastic history class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , it's so strange for you to say things like that . What had happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've learnt the story of Zheg He Sailing to West Ocean . He is a real great navigator .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did your teacher tell you the route he took ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , he , with his fleet , came across the Indian Ocean , and arrived at the east coast of Africa .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great , do you still remember when he started his voyage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , that is from 1405 to 1433 , which is in Ming dynasty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , by the way , do you finish reading the book Robinson Crusoe I've bought for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet , you know I have a lot of homework to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should speed up , because the story of Robinson can give you a better understanding about what you learned today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , great Daddy , after supper , I'll embark on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's my boy ! Wait , Daniel , when is Pirates of the Caribbean on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it about Captain Jack Sparrow , who wants to find the treasure on the sea ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly , now , tell me the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won't tell you , unless you promise to let me watch it with you .
segments.speaker: S2
